name: Haven (itch) (MichaelMonty)
description:
Created for the May Day Mental Health Global Game Jam.

Haven is a game about providing a space for self-improvement and mental well-being. You are given a world, your Haven, and are free to build and refine it to your liking. However,  to gain resources for building your Haven, you must complete personal tasks at your own pace.

Haven aims to combat executive dysfunction for demotivated people who find difficulty accomplishing meaningful tasks in their day-to-day lives. By giving players a unique world in which to express themselves, they can find greater rewards in reaching their personal goals in a low-stress, judgment-free environment.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/ARROWS: move the camera
  • LEFT CLICK: interact with the world

NOTES: 

  • Graphical glitches when played on Mac OS
  • Sound loading may take a while

CREDITS: 

  • Code, graphics, UI, design - Michael Monty
  • Music, FX art, original design/concept - Avery Jaye

  • Day/Night cycle
  • Color "recipe" book
